personal.title: Software Engineer
personal.about: I'm a passionate full-stack developer with 2+ years of experience creating beautiful, functional, and user-centered digital experiences. I specialize in modern web technologies and have a keen eye for design. My goal is to bridge the gap between technical excellence and exceptional user experience.

experience.description: Lead development of scalable web applications using React, Node.js, and AWS. Mentored junior developers and improved team productivity by 40%.
achievements: Implemented interactive diagramming features using GoJS in a React-based system, building 50K+ custom node/link templates with drag-and-drop, zoom/pan, and real-time updates, improving user task efficiency by 40%.
Integrated RESTful APIs with advanced error state handling and retry mechanisms.
Mentored 2 interns, accelerating onboarding and enabling them to ship production-ready code within 2 weeks.
Architected and led a performance-critical feature for a high-traffic application, achieving 25% faster load times and zero post-deployment rollbacks.
Designed a real-time visualization dashboard using advanced optimization techniques like code-splitting, lazy loading, and CDN caching, improving page load speeds by 50%.
Developed Flask-based backend services with in-memory data handling mimicking Redis behavior, reducing API response times by 90%.

experience.description: Contributed as a Full Stack Developer intern to build a complete e-commerce web application from scratch based on Figma designs. Focused on delivering responsive frontend and high-performance backend architecture with secure authentication.
achievements: Designed and developed a fully functional e-commerce platform from Figma designs using React.js and TypeScript
Built secure and scalable backend APIs using Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, and JWT-based authentication
Implemented Redis caching with eviction policy to support stateful backend, improving API response time by 95%+
Delivered a fully responsive frontend interface across desktop and mobile devices
Improved user engagement by 35% through intuitive design and performance optimizations
Integrated modern UI/UX design systems to align with current web standards

projects.title: E-Commerce Platform
projects.description: A full-featured e-commerce platform with payment integration, inventory management, and admin dashboard.

projects.title: Task Management App
projects.description: A collaborative task management application with real-time updates and team collaboration features.

projects.title: Weather Dashboard
projects.description: A beautiful weather dashboard with location-based forecasts and interactive charts.

projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.description: A responsive portfolio website built with modern technologies and smooth animations.
